description: This file defines a 'Blog to Podcast' agent and a playground setup for a web application that converts blog content into audio podcasts using various tools and models.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured to perform specific tasks, such as converting blog content to audio.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used within the agent.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Represents the web application playground environment for testing and deploying agents.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent data in a SQLite database.

classes.name: ElevenLabsTools
classes.description: Provides tools to generate audio using ElevenLabs API.

classes.name: FirecrawlTools
classes.description: Provides tools to scrape blog content from URLs.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server for the playground application.
